headline: Moderna opens UK vaccine manufacturing facility

headline: Moderna opens mRNA production center in UK
summary: Moderna announces the opening of the Moderna Innovation and Technology Centre in Harwell, Oxfordshire, the first facility in the UK to produce mRNA vaccines locally. The site will support the NHS ...
